content.en: Graph ML advancements: Researchers are exploring how graph convolutional networks can be used to learn from complex and diverse graph-structured data. They have also developed a neural network model called Model R that uses deep learning to predict link weights in graph mining. Another algorithm, Loukas's coarsening algorithm, is being used to improve unsupervised graph representation learning. These advancements in algorithms are expanding the capabilities of machine learning on graph data and addressing challenges in graph analysis.
content.da: Graf ML fremskridt: Forskere undersøger, hvordan grafkonvolutionsnetværk kan bruges til at lære fra komplekse og forskelligartede grafstrukturerede data. De har også udviklet en neuralt netværksmodel kaldet Model R, som bruger dyb læring til at forudsige linkvægte i grafmining. En anden algoritme, Loukas's coarsening algoritme, anvendes til at forbedre usuperviseret grafrepræsentationslæring. Disse fremskridt inden for algoritmer udvider mulighederne for maskinlæring på grafdata og tackler udfordringer i grafanalyse.
